pr_title: Refactor apitest for api calls to any daemon type

timeline.message: Move version service proto def to bottom of grpc.proto
Add dispute agents service proto def to grpc.proto

Add core impl for registering dispute agents

This change supports registering mediators and refund agents on
daemons running on regest or testnet chains.  Registering
arbitrators is not supported.

Refactor test cases to use arbitrary grpc stubs

Most test cases send requests to the alicedaemon, but new test cases
will need to be able to send requests to arbitration and bob daemons.

Add api dispute agent registration test case

This test case checks that mediators and refund agents can be
registered over grpc, but not on mainnet.

timeline.bodyText: Relying on string matching for tests makes them fragile. At a minimum we should probably add a note for strings that are used in this way.
timeline.author: sqrrm

replies.bodyText: I will fix this in another PR.
replies.author: ghubstan

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I think this happens quite a bit in other tests as well iirc. Not urgent, but good to have a better solution for the future.
replies.author: sqrrm

replies.bodyText:
This string matching problem has bitten me a few times, when I misspelled "bitciond" in some test case setups.
PR 4540 fixes it.
replies.author: ghubstan
